# The `InstrReplacerDstCOPY` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> Converter which replaces an instruction with another, and adds a COPY from the new instruction&#39;s destination to the old one&#39;s. <a href="#details">More...</a>
